title: Lundayeh (1982) Genesis Portion
description: Lun Bawang or Lundayeh is the language spoken by the Lun Bawangs. It belongs to the Malayo-Polynesian family. "Putoh" is an alternate name in East Kalimantan.
provider: Bible Society of Singapore, Malaysia & Brunci

language.name: Lundayeh
language.area: Interior from Brunei Bay to Padas River headwaters, to Baram headwaters, and into East Kalimantan, Indonesian mountains where Sesayap River tributaries arise. Also in Brunei, Malaysia (Sarawak).
